#Text=A Mutton Pye.

#Text= The Compleat Houfewife .

#Text=When it is bak’d, pour into it a Ragoo.

#Text=A Veal Pye.
#Text=R AISE an high Pye, then cut a Fillet of Veal
#Text= into three or four Fillets, feafon it with favou-
#Text= ry Spice, a little minc’d Sage and fweet Herbs 3 lay
#Text= it in the Pye, with dices of Bacon at the bottom,
#Text= and betwixt each piece, lay on Butter, and clofe the
#Text= Pye.
#Text=A "Turkey Pye .
#Text= II and fome lean Bacon; mince them very fine,
#Text= and add a double quantity of Suet; put it all in a
#Text= Marble Mortar; beat it well, fprinkle it with a little
#Text= Water in the beating; feafon it with Pepper, Salt,
#Text= and a little Cloves and Mace, to your Tafte; fhred
#Text= Spinnage very fine, if you would have it look green,
#Text= or elfe without; make it up as you ufe it, with an
#Text= Egg or two, and roll it in long or round Balls.
#Text=120 The Compleat Houfewife .
